comments.body: `object deprecated` above should also be `@compileTimeOnly` since it doesn't exist in the scala 2 scala.language

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@     *  should not use them.
     */
    @compileTimeOnly("`symbolLiterals` can only be used at compile time in import statements")
    object symbolLiterals
  end deprecated
